properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; New York Harbor; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 3 at 3:25AM EST until March 4 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected.

* WHERE...The Long Island Sound, New York Harbor, Peconic and
Gardiners Bays, and South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through
Shinnecock Bay.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM EST WEDNESDAY
